General.Name: DR.Wu Skincare Co Ltd
General.Description: Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. develops and sells skincare and cosmetics products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers cleansers, masks, toners, serums, lotion/cream/gel, UV/DD creams, and eye care products, as well as makeup and body products. It also provides products for acne and pores, blackheads, dry skin, signs of aging, dull and spotty skin, sensitive skin, whitening, and emergency care. The company offers its products through a network of approximately 2000 sales locations in Mainland China, Myanmar, Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore, Canada, Vietnam, the Philippines, and Japan. Dr. Wu Skincare Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.70, Nanjing East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
